long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
detoxifAI is a tool that can detect toxic language in Google Docs and in Gmail and provide instantaneous feedback by highlighting exactly which words are toxic, improving cyberbullying and toxic behavior online constructively. 

detoxifAI is powered by novel machine learning algorithms, with an accuracy of over 98%, and is the only toxic comment algorithm that gives live feedback.

Install the Chrome Extension and open up a Google Doc or Gmail to get going. Protect your loved ones from cyberbullying and online abuse today.

The extension currently works on English language documents only. 

Disagree with the result? Please email us at detoxifai@gmail.com. While our model is robust, we are still are sill in our infancy and we may get a some classifications wrong.
